metadata.title: ChicWind Womens Breathable Mesh Walking Mules Sneakers Open Back Slip On Shoes
features: Widened toe cap and breathable mesh upper offers enough freedom during walking
Backless slip on mule sneaker design for quick and easy wearing, yet looking fashionable
Lightweight and flexible MD outsole greatly release feet stress and pain for comfortable experience
This closed toe slippers can be used for long time standing, travelling, work, indoor and casual wear
Multifunctional Shoes for indoor slippers, garden clogs, driving loafers, outdoor sneakers, bedroom shoes
description: Womens mesh clog house slippers mule shoes are designed for great breathability. Open back slip on sneaker for quick and easy wearing. MD outsole greatly release feet stress and pain, offering relaxing wearing experience. All make it a comfortable moccasin slippers for you. Perfect gift for your mom, wife, daughter, women, friends and colleagues. Suitable for walking, long time standing, driving, travelling, work, outdoor, indoor and casual wear. 5 M US Women=35 EU=Foot Length 8.85 in 6 M US Women=36 EU=Foot Length 9.05 in 6.5 M US Women=37 EU=Foot Length 9.25 in 7.5 M US Women=38 EU=Foot Length 9.44 in 8 M US Women=39 EU=Foot Length 9.64 in 9 M US Women=40 EU=Foot Length 9.84 in 10 M US Women=41 EU=Foot Length 10.03 in 10.5 M US Women=42 EU=Foot Length 10.23 in Please check your measurements to make sure the item fits before ordering.
